Refresh last version program (include code fix from Previous RUN/DR)

MANAGER NUMBER 

-----------------------------------------------------OLD MIG
Create manager number by default : (0035  / DESPER for RUN1)
TRANSACTIONS  : BI12-1, BI12-2 & BI12-5
FOR EACH COMPANY : 302,303,304,305
For the 3 mandats type (0, 1 & 3)
------------------------------------------------------

A toutes fins utiles, afin de générer un fichier R500.QSAM complet, c’est-à-dire permettant l’intégration de tous les clients, il faut que les codes managers créés soient dans un group. Pour le code par défaut 0035 , vérifier par BI12-3 que le group est bien renseigné

Confirmation application execution previous task - generation of the file to confirm the availability of the code_mngr_portf_anlzs_0145
Job dw_exin5_13.ksh
Provide the file in your feeback
Verify Intermediary code (code apporteur) by default (via BC21-2) with code:interm in param

Code-type-risk update in system code 
Transaction UT01
(macro)

**TECHNICAL BROKER**
Check the existance of the technical broker : 001/3203608 302/3203608 303/3203608 304/3203608 305/3203608

Transaction : EN21 with office 302 and Param : A3203608
Transaction : EN21 with office 303 and Param : A3203608
Transaction : EN21 with office 304 and Param : A3203608
Transaction : EN21 with office 305 and Param : A3203608

Check the availability of BIC code DBI in T_SEPA_BANK_DIRECT table (provide the extract)
« select * from NHDBO.T_SEPA_BANK_DIRECT t where t.Code_Bic11_1099 like '%RUEGCHZZXXX%'  »
